title: Diagnosis
subtitle: Test your end-to-end miner connectivity in few steps

step.readyToLaunch: You can run the diagnosis using the button above

errorCodes.timeout: Can't send the test proposal due to a timeout exception, try again in few minutes

finishedSuccess.title: All diagnosis steps passed successfully
finishedSuccess.description:
Your miner connectivity has been checked without any error
You are ready to receive deals using CIDgravity !

ERR_TIMEOUT.name: Timeout during diagnosis procedure
ERR_TIMEOUT.resolveTips:
This error should not occur !
Please try later or contact CIDgravity team

ERR_CIDGRAVITY_SIDE.name: Checking CIDgravity diagnosis server
ERR_CIDGRAVITY_SIDE.resolveTips:
This error should not occur !
Please try later or contact CIDgravity team

ERR_INVALID_MULTI_ADDRESS_IN_MINER_INFO.name: Valid multi address in miner info

ERR_CONNECT_MINER_PEER_ID.name: Connect to your miner Peer ID

ERR_GET_ASK_PRICES_NOT_SET_TO_ZERO.resolveTips: Set the prices via the boost UI/Settings menu

ERR_GET_ASK_SIZES_NOT_PROPERLY_SET.resolveTips: Set the sizes via the boost UI/Settings menu

ERR_SEND_PROPOSAL.name: Use boost client to send the deal proposal

ERR_CIDGRAVITY_CONNECTOR_MISCONFIGURED.name: Checking CIDgravity connector configuration
ERR_CIDGRAVITY_CONNECTOR_MISCONFIGURED.resolveTips: Check your miner logs to find the problem
